html: Any influence or supervision of taxpayer-funded personnel and programs by unelected, unaccountable and politically-motivated advisors is deeply concerning, especially amid such a tumultuous time at the @DeptVetAffairs.
text: Any influence or supervision of taxpayer-funded personnel and programs by unelected, unaccountable and politically-motivated advisors is deeply concerning, especially amid such a tumultuous time at the @DeptVetAffairs.

html: In a sweeping investigation that turned up hundreds of internal documents, @ProPublica has reported that three unelected political advisors, none of whom are veterans, have had considerable sway over the @DeptVetAffairs.https://www.propublica.org/article/ike-perlmutter-bruce-moskowitz-marc-sherman-shadow-rulers-of-the-va …

html: Early detection is everything when it comes to cancer. I’m glad my primary care doc suggested a colonoscopy when I had symptoms. If you’re 50+ w/ an average risk for developing colorectal cancer, talk to your doctor about which screening test is right for you. #MTNews #MTPol

html: This bill will NOT: ✘ Loosen restrictions on Wall Street. ✘ Make any structural changes to the @CFPB. ✘ Benefit large foreign banks. In fact, by providing #Relief4MainStreet, this bill ensures small, local lenders can continue to compete with Wall Street. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/x4jwXk4at4
text:
This bill will NOT:
✘ Loosen restrictions on Wall Street.
✘ Make any structural changes to the @CFPB.
✘ Benefit large foreign banks.
In fact, by providing #Relief4MainStreet, this bill ensures small, local lenders can continue to compete with Wall Street. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/x4jwXk4at4

html: This bill will provide much-needed regulatory relief for community banks & credit unions, establish stronger consumer protections & break through the Washington gridlock to achieve something rarely seen in Washington nowadays—results. #Relief4MainStreet #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2cqGNwOOlL
text: This bill will provide much-needed regulatory relief for community banks & credit unions, establish stronger consumer protections & break through the Washington gridlock to achieve something rarely seen in Washington nowadays—results. #Relief4MainStreet #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2cqGNwOOlL

html: Without #Relief4MainStreet, rural towns & cities will dry up, small businesses will lose access to capital, the dream of home ownership will be out of reach for millions of Americans & all we’ll have left are the same big banks that tanked our economy in the first place. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/gqOUeUbnIM

html: Prior to the financial crisis, there were 72 chartered banks in Montana. Today that number is 49. And Montana is not unique. Bank consolidation is leaving communities underserved across rural America. We need #Relief4MainStreet. #mtpolpic.twitter.com/2mXqCq2Ged

html: Holly Wiest grew up in Montana before moving to France to become a pastry chef. She moved back to Helena in 2014 and started @CottonTopPastry. Last week she opened her new shop to the public and sold out of everything within hours. Now that’s a Big Sky success story!pic.twitter.com/0wOMlfbja1
text: Holly Wiest grew up in Montana before moving to France to become a pastry chef. She moved back to Helena in 2014 and started @CottonTopPastry. html: We need a long-term cure instead of another band-aid fix. The Caring For Our Veterans Act is that cure.

html: We believe this bill needs to be passed right away because Congress can’t keep governing with short term solutions.
text: We believe this bill needs to be passed right away because Congress can’t keep governing with short term solutions.

html: Our bipartisan Caring for Our Veterans Act will replace the Choice Program with one, easy-to-navigate system that puts the decision of where to seek care in the hands of veterans and their doctors.

html: Last night around 1 a.m., the Senate voted to pass the first major tax bill in a generation with support from only one party. The folks who voted yes on this bill did so at the expense of our kids and grandkids. They’re the ones who will be paying this tab long after we are gone.

html: Drug-related crime in Billings has more than doubled since 2012. html: It's 2 a.m. Saturday morning & the U.S. Senate just passed a hastily-written bill that adds $1.5 trillion to the debt. Washington dysfunction has hit a new low and Montana families and small businesses deserve better than this.
text: It's 2 a.m. Saturday morning & the U.S. Senate just passed a hastily-written bill that adds $1.5 trillion to the debt. Washington dysfunction has hit a new low and Montana families and small businesses deserve better than this.

html: I was just handed a 479-page tax bill a few hours before the vote. One page literally has hand scribbled policy changes on it that can’t be read. This is Washington, D.C. at its worst. Montanans deserve so much better.pic.twitter.com/q6lTpXoXS0
text: I was just handed a 479-page tax bill a few hours before the vote. One page literally has hand scribbled policy changes on it that can’t be read. This is Washington, D.C. at its worst.  Montanans deserve so much better.pic.twitter.com/q6lTpXoXS0
